thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 51 of 7355
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: Buying, and especially from abroad, can be a stressful experience. But on top of their attractive prices, I trust B&H and their website entirely. The buying experience is seamless, and in the one case that a parcel got lost by the post office and later turned up after B&H had sent a replacement for free, I was offered to keep both items with no extra charge. The only thing that prevents me from buying more is that I would have to pay import charges, which would make my purchases less attractive. But this of course has nothing to do with the store itself, which I recommend without reservation.
